headline.main: RUSSIANS PUSH ON TOWARD KEY CITIES; Armies Are 45 Miles Southeast of Rostov and 95 Miles Southeast of Kharkov RED ARMY MOVES FORWARD IN IMPORTANT SECTORS RUSSIANS PUSH ON TOWARD KEY CITIES

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Tuesday, Feb. 2 -- The Soviet Army is forty-five miles from the Caucasian gateway of Rostov and only sixty-five miles east of Kursk, one of the main German bastions in Southern Russia, Moscow announced early today in a communique recorded by the Soviet monitor here.
abstract: USSR forces take Mechetinsk, Rostov drive; take Kashen, Voronezh front; advance on Krasnodar and Kharkov; Gers rept on fighting; map
